section.title: Environments
section.para: Environments are used by the passes to exchange information about the available bindings and related information. They take the abstract form of tables, though these tables are sometimes represented as column vectors, and sometimes represented as matrices.
In all environments, the name field is a column of simple character vectors, or strings.

section.title: Parse bindings
section.para: The Parse pass returns a second argument which is an environment of the bindings at top level and their types.
